Text.Page:
We got an unusual request for supplies from the catacombs.

It's a dangerous journey, so we're sending you. Report to Artur.

I do need help! {@LinkCreature:418#2006#Geik} requested cadmiel mushrooms to test on argons.

You'll need to gather some, and then deliver them to him.

Pretty fast work, . I only sent the request yesterday.

I'm eager to see what effect these cadmiel mushrooms have on argon physiology.

I hope it doesn't make them stronger!
Someone's standing in the way of scientific advancement. I need those mushrooms, <PCNAME>.
